member.name: M:Wdsf.Api.Client.Client.ClearLinks(Wdsf.Api.Client.Models.ParticipantBaseDetail)
member.summary: Removes the Link property of all Score types to reduce the model's overall size.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Competition.Since
member.summary: List all competitions since a date. The date is formated according to ISO YYYY/MM/DD.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Competition.Until
member.summary: List all competitions until a date. The date is formated according to ISO YYYY/MM/DD.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Competition.Status
member.summary: List all competitions having a certain status. Allowed values are PreRegistration, Registering, RegistrationClosed, Processing, Closed and Canceled.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Competition.Location
member.summary: List competition that take/took place in a certain city. This starts matching the begining of a city's name.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Competition.Division
member.summary: List only competitions af a certain division. Allowed values are General and Professional.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Person.Name
member.summary: Searches a person whos name starts with this value.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Person.Phonetic
member.summary: This filter works in combination with the name filter. If it is set to "true" the name is searched according to SOUNDEX rules.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Person.MIN
member.summary: Search a person having a certian member ID number. The leading 1 can be ommited.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Person.NameOrMin
member.summary: Works as a combination of "Name" and "MIN" filter.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Person.AgeGroup
member.summary: Search for persons of a certain age group. Valid values are Adult, Senior I, Senior II, Youth, ...

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Person.Division
member.summary: Search for persons being part of a divivion. Allowed values are General and Professional.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Person.Type
member.summary: Search for persons of a certain type. Allowed values are:Athlete, Adjudicator or Chairman

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Couple.Name
member.summary: Searches couples where one member's name starts with this value.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Couple.Phonetic
member.summary: This filter works in combination with the name filter. If it is set to "true" the name is searched according to SOUNDEX rules.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Couple.MIN
member.summary: Search couples where one member has a certain member ID number. The leading 1 can be ommited.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Couple.NameOrMin
member.summary: Works as a combination of "Name" and "MIN" filter.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Couple.AgeGroup
member.summary: Search for couples of certain age group. Valid values are Adult, Senior I, Senior II, Youth, ...

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Couple.Division
member.summary: Search for couples being part of a divivion. Allowed values are General and Professional.

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Ranking.Name
member.summary: WRL of a certain date. The value is an ISO date, YYYY/MM/DD

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Ranking.Discipline
member.summary: WRL of a certain discipline. Allowd values are Latin, Standard and Ten Dance

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Ranking.AgeGroup
member.summary: WRL of a certain age group. Valid values are Adult, Senior I, Senior II, Youth, ...

member.name: F:Wdsf.Api.Client.FilterNames.Ranking.Division
member.summary: WRL of a certain division. Allowed values are General and Professional.
